Side Effects: Effective at first_ but gradually began to experience episodes of vertigo and dizziness.  Each episode became more and more severe

This medicine really helped improve my overall heart function_ aided in my chronic heart failure post infarctus_ and reduced my shortness of breath.  I have had virtually no negative side effects except some male breast enlargement.
Comments: The only negative was some noticable male breast enlargement.  I am not happy with that but it is only cosmetic.  Small price to pay for the excellent benefits that this medicine has given me.  Far superior to Spiro.
